s1.name: JORAM manuals
s1.p: The JORAM documentation is packaged for the 4.2 version as a single pdf document.

It is well known by the JORAM team that this documentation is not sufficient and sometimes vague or unclear. Do not hesitate to provide any comment or feedback that could help us improving the doc. Also, any contribution is welcome.
The Old documentation is still accessible here
